name: Juggernaut

grantsPowers.name: Spite
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Regenerate when Stunned; Knocked Down

description: No other form of combatant is built to last like a Juggernaut. Mercilessness, ruthlessness, and resiliency are also defining characteristics that attribute to the robust nature of an unstoppable fighter whose impact will be felt repeatedly.
lore: Like a boulder rolling down a hill, a juggernaut is a large and unyielding force that cannot be stopped.
